text: Thanks everyone. Checking out a few proposals now. Will reach out to <@U25PYL3Q8> and DeckerDevs!

Any experienced HubSpot devs/architects here looking for an advising gig? We're working on a public app that makes heavy use of the HS API and looking for folks who have experience launching marketplace apps. DM if you might be interested in joining our team!

Hey <@U07JFKC9V08> :wave:
I'd hugely recommend <@UN7CEHC9X> for a consultancy role. He has a profound knowledge of anything architect-wise and expertise working with HubSpot API :ok_hand::skin-tone-2:

P.S. Two listed apps on the marketplace
